mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TEAM_APPLICATION WHERE TEAM_NO = #{teamNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAM_APPLICATION (APPLY_NO, MEMBER_NO, TEAM_NO, APPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_TANO.NEXTVAL, #{ memberNo }, #{ teamNo }, #{ applyContent })
mapper.select: SELECT TA.APPLY_NO, TA.MEMBER_NO, TA.TEAM_NO, TA.APPLY_CONTENT, TA.APPLY_DATE, TA.STATUS, M.NICKNAME, T.TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM_APPLICATION TA JOIN MEMBER M ON TA.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN TEAM T ON TA.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE TA.TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}
